studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Modified wording regarding enrollment of women to allow more flexibility in sex ratio requirements
Added four exceptions for rescreening of participants

studyAmendmentReasons.reasonText: To allow rescreening of participants that were not previously enrolled in the study due to personal or logistical reasons or due to minor deviations that were not considered clinically relevant
Wording of inclusion criteria was changed to have more flexibility regarding ratio of sexes

studyChanges.afterText: approx. 30% or more of each sex
studyChanges.summary: Changed wording regarding enrollment of women to allow more flexibility regarding ratio of sexes

studyChanges.afterText: Four exceptions for rescreening were introduced
studyChanges.summary: Added exceptions to allow rescreening of participants not previously enrolled due to personal or logistical reasons or minor non-clinically relevant deviations
